name: The Disaster
description:
The Disaster

A "cube" game aimed primarily at zombies and survival.
Currently with 3 modes, "Protect The House (Classic)" and "Protect The House 2" with the aim of defending the house from the zombies. Another mode is "Practice Mode" where the goal is to train and get stronger!
Your goal is to save your life, save the house and eliminate all the zombies that come from the fog.
You will be able to place items, interact, unlock weapons and more with zombies points.

But remember: every time you run you lose energy, you can drink the bottle of energy that restores it. Case ends, you will lose life until you lose.

Announcements: A new survival mode is coming!

New mode added!

PRACTICE!

Upgrade and train your aim with fake targets! Destroy them and always try to improve your time!
